instructions.name: add_multi_token_inheritance
docs: Add multiple tokens to Smart Wallet inheritance

instructions.name: create_smart_wallet_inheritance
docs: Creates a Smart Wallet inheritance setup with PDA wallet ownership

instructions.name: deposit_to_smart_wallet
docs: Deposits SOL into the Smart Wallet PDA

instructions.name: deposit_tokens_to_smart_wallet
docs: Deposits SPL tokens into the Smart Wallet PDA

instructions.name: execute_inheritance
docs: Executes inheritance by transferring all Smart Wallet assets to heirs

instructions.name: initialize_user_profile
docs: Initialize or update user profile with subscription status

instructions.name: log_notification
docs: Log notification event for inheritance triggers

instructions.name: update_smart_wallet_activity
docs: Updates activity timestamp for Smart Wallet owner

errors.name: MismatchedArrays
errors.msg: Recipients and amounts arrays must have the same length.

errors.name: InsufficientAccounts
errors.msg: Insufficient accounts provided for batch transfer.

errors.name: InvalidAllocation
errors.msg: Heir allocation percentages must sum to 100.

errors.name: CustomInactivityNotAllowed
errors.msg: Custom inactivity periods not allowed for free users.

errors.name: TooManyTokens
errors.msg: Too many tokens (max 20 per Smart Wallet).
